en.title: Biweekly Pay Calculator
en.seoTitle: Biweekly Pay Calculator - Calculate Biweekly Salary and Annual Income
en.metaDescription: Free biweekly pay calculator to convert annual salary to biweekly pay, calculate take-home pay, and understand your bi-weekly paycheck. Perfect for biweekly employees.
en.description: Calculate your biweekly pay from annual salary or hourly wage. Understand how much you earn per pay period, calculate annual income from biweekly pay, and plan your budget with accurate biweekly paycheck estimates.
en.summary: Convert between annual, biweekly, and hourly pay rates with tax calculations.
instructions: Enter your annual salary or hourly wage
Enter hours worked per week (for hourly)
Add tax rate to see net biweekly pay
View breakdown of gross and net pay per pay period

seoContent.introduction: Our biweekly pay calculator helps employees paid every two weeks understand their earnings. Convert annual salary to biweekly pay, calculate take-home pay after taxes and deductions, and plan your budget around your 26 annual paychecks. Perfect for employees transitioning between pay schedules or evaluating job offers with biweekly pay.
benefits: Calculate biweekly pay from annual salary instantly
Convert biweekly pay to annual income
Estimate take-home pay after taxes and deductions
Understand gross vs net biweekly earnings
Plan monthly budget with biweekly paychecks
Compare job offers with different pay schedules
steps: Enter your annual salary or hourly wage rate
For hourly: Enter hours worked per week (typically 40)
Add your tax rate (federal, state, local combined)
Include any pre-tax deductions (401k, health insurance)
View your gross and net biweekly pay
inputsExplained: Annual Salary: Your total yearly salary before taxes
Hourly Wage: Your pay rate per hour worked
Hours Per Week: Regular hours worked weekly (usually 40)
Tax Rate: Combined federal, state, and local tax percentage
Pre-tax Deductions: 401k, health insurance, HSA contributions
seoContent.formulaExplanation: Biweekly pay is calculated by dividing annual salary by 26 (the number of biweekly pay periods in a year). For hourly workers: Biweekly Pay = Hourly Rate × Hours Per Week × 2. Net biweekly pay is calculated by subtracting taxes and deductions from gross pay. Important: There are 26 biweekly pay periods per year, not 24. This means two months each year have three paychecks instead of two.
examples: $52,000 annual salary = $2,000 gross biweekly pay (26 pay periods)
$60,000 salary with 25% taxes = $1,730.77 net biweekly pay
resultsExplanation: Gross Biweekly Pay: Your pay before any deductions
Net Biweekly Pay: Your take-home pay after taxes and deductions
Annual Gross: Total yearly income before taxes
Annual Net: Total yearly take-home pay
Pay Periods: 26 biweekly periods per year
seoContent.whoItsFor: This calculator is essential for employees paid biweekly (every two weeks), job seekers comparing salary offers, freelancers converting to full-time positions, budget planners tracking biweekly income, HR professionals calculating employee compensation, and anyone transitioning from weekly, monthly, or semi-monthly pay schedules to biweekly pay.
seoContent.disclaimer: This biweekly pay calculator provides estimates based on standard calculations. Actual paychecks may vary based on your specific tax situation, withholdings, state and local taxes, pre-tax deductions (401k, health insurance), garnishments, and employer-specific payroll policies. Tax rates are simplified estimates. For precise paycheck calculations, consult your HR department or payroll provider. This tool is for planning purposes only.
relatedTools: Paycheck calculator for detailed tax withholding
Salary calculator for annual income analysis
Hourly to salary calculator for rate conversions

faqs.question: How many biweekly pay periods are there in a year?
faqs.answer: There are 26 biweekly pay periods in a year. Biweekly means every two weeks, so 52 weeks ÷ 2 = 26 pay periods. This differs from semi-monthly pay (24 periods) where employees are paid twice per month.

faqs.question: How do I calculate biweekly pay from annual salary?
faqs.answer: Divide your annual salary by 26. For example, if you earn $52,000 per year, your biweekly gross pay is $52,000 ÷ 26 = $2,000 per paycheck. This is before taxes and other deductions.

faqs.question: Why do some months have three paychecks?
faqs.answer: Since there are 52 weeks in a year and 26 biweekly pay periods, some months will have three paychecks instead of two. This happens twice per year. For budgeting, many people use these 'extra' paychecks for savings or large expenses.

faqs.question: What's the difference between biweekly and semi-monthly pay?
faqs.answer: Biweekly pay occurs every two weeks (26 pay periods per year, consistent days like every other Friday). Semi-monthly pay occurs twice per month (24 pay periods, typically on set dates like the 15th and last day). Biweekly provides two extra paychecks annually.

es.title: Calculadora de Pago Quincenal
es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Pago Quincenal - Calcular Salario Quincenal e Ingreso Anual
es.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de pago quincenal para convertir salario anual a pago quincenal, calcular pago neto y entender su cheque de pago quincenal.
es.description: Calcule su pago quincenal desde salario anual o salario por hora. Entienda cuánto gana por período de pago y planifique su presupuesto.
es.summary: Convierta entre tasas de pago anual, quincenal y por hora con cálculos de impuestos.

seoContent.introduction: Nuestra calculadora de pago quincenal ayuda a empleados pagados cada dos semanas a entender sus ingresos. Convierta salario anual a pago quincenal y planifique su presupuesto.
benefits: Calcule pago quincenal desde salario anual instantáneamente
Convierta pago quincenal a ingreso anual
Estime el pago neto después de impuestos
steps: Ingrese su salario anual o salario por hora
Para por hora: Ingrese horas trabajadas por semana
Vea su pago quincenal bruto y neto
seoContent.formulaExplanation: El pago quincenal se calcula dividiendo el salario anual por 26 (el número de períodos de pago quincenales en un año).

seoContent.introduction: Nossa calculadora de pagamento quinzenal ajuda funcionários pagos a cada duas semanas a entender seus ganhos. Converta salário anual em pagamento quinzenal e planeje seu orçamento.
benefits: Calcule pagamento quinzenal a partir do salário anual instantaneamente
Converta pagamento quinzenal em renda anual
Estime o pagamento líquido após impostos

examples: Salário anual de $52.000 = Pagamento quinzenal bruto de $2.000

fr.title: Calculateur de Paiement Bihebdomadaire

seoContent.introduction: Notre calculateur de paiement bihebdomadaire aide les employés payés toutes les deux semaines à comprendre leurs revenus. Convertissez le salaire annuel en paiement bihebdomadaire et planifiez votre budget.
benefits: Calculez le paiement bihebdomadaire à partir du salaire annuel instantanément

Estimez le salaire net après impôts

Voyez votre paiement bihebdomadaire brut et net
seoContent.formulaExplanation: Le paiement bihebdomadaire est calculé en divisant le salaire annuel par 26 (le nombre de périodes de paie bihebdomadaires dans une année).
